channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Pam Bondi clashes with House Democrats at DOJ oversight hearing
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi clashed with Democratic lawmakers who questioned her about the Epstein files and the weaponization of the Justice Department at an oversight hearing Wednesday.
item.content:encoded: Attorney General Pam Bondi clashed with Democratic lawmakers who questioned her about the Epstein files and the weaponization of the Justice Department at an oversight hearing Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson

item.title: Rep. Pramila Jayapal talks about AG Pam Bondi's contentious DOJ oversight hearing
item.description: Rep. Pramila Jayapal, D-Wash., offers her assessment of Attorney General Pam Bondi's testimony before the House Judiciary Committee.
item.content:encoded: Rep. Pramila Jayapal, D-Wash., offers her assessment of Attorney General Pam Bondi's testimony before the House Judiciary Committee.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Remote Canadian community grapples with the aftermath of a deadly mass shooting
item.description: The remote community of Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, is grieving after a devastating mass shooting — one of the deadliest in Canada's recent history.
item.content:encoded: The remote community of Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, is grieving after a devastating mass shooting — one of the deadliest in Canada's recent history.
item.dc:creator: Sheena Rossiter

item.title: The 800th 'The Simpsons' episode is set in Philadelphia. But Portland is in its DNA
item.description: As The Simpsons celebrates a landmark episode, a tour of creator Matt Groening's hometown reveals the real-world Portland landmarks behind characters like Ned Flanders and Sideshow Bob.
item.content:encoded:
As The Simpsons celebrates a landmark episode, a tour of creator Matt Groening's hometown reveals the real-world Portland landmarks behind characters like Ned Flanders and Sideshow Bob.

(Image credit: The Simpsons)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: U.S. colleges received more than $5 billion in foreign gifts, contracts in 2025
item.description: New data from the U.S. Education Department show the extent of international gifts and contracts to colleges and universities.
item.content:encoded:
New data from the U.S. Education Department show the extent of international gifts and contracts to colleges and universities.

(Image credit: Screenshot by NPR)
item.dc:creator: Elissa Nadworny

item.title: Remembering 'Dawson's Creek' star James Van Der Beek
item.description: James Van Der Beek, who played heartthrob Dawson Leery on "Dawson's Creek," died Wednesday at 48 years old.
item.content:encoded: James Van Der Beek, who played heartthrob Dawson Leery on "Dawson's Creek," died Wednesday at 48 years old.
item.dc:creator: Linda Holmes

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: AG Pam Bondi's contentious hearing before the House Judiciary Committee, six House Republicans vote against Trump's Canadian tariffs, revised figures show hiring in 2025 was lower than reported.
item.content:encoded: AG Pam Bondi's contentious hearing before the House Judiciary Committee, six House Republicans vote against Trump's Canadian tariffs, revised figures show hiring in 2025 was lower than reported.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Rep. Nancy Mace says she wants Americans to know the truth about the Epstein files
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks to Republican Rep. Nancy Mace of South Carolina, who says she has a "list of names" of people to depose after viewing unredacted versions of the Epstein files.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks to Republican Rep. Nancy Mace of South Carolina, who says she has a "list of names" of people to depose after viewing unredacted versions of the Epstein files.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Britain's 'ugliest landmark' becomes protected historic monument
item.description: Once derided as Britain's ugliest building, London's Southbank Centre is now a protected historic monument -- beloved by symphony-goers as well as skateboarders, who've taken over its Brutalist ramps.
item.content:encoded: Once derided as Britain's ugliest building, London's Southbank Centre is now a protected historic monument -- beloved by symphony-goers as well as skateboarders, who've taken over its Brutalist ramps.
item.dc:creator: Lauren Frayer

item.title: Bangladesh votes in its first election since ousting of Hasina
item.description: In Bangladesh's election, one woman who rose to prominence fighting former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's government finds herself competing against a man she once risked her safety to defend.
item.content:encoded: In Bangladesh's election, one woman who rose to prominence fighting former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's government finds herself competing against a man she once risked her safety to defend.
item.dc:creator: Diaa Hadid
